Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • Actor
  • public class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
    The Actor Class contains methods used by both the dealer and the player in Blackjack

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      java.lang.String myCards  
      int myScore  
      int numberOfCards  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Actor()
      Constructor -myCards -myScore -numberOfCards

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addCard​(java.lang.String card)
      Adds a Card to the actors "hand"
      boolean catch17()
      checks if the actor has more than 17
      boolean catch21()
      checks if the actor has 21
      boolean catchBust()
      checks if the actor has busted
      int getScore()
      Returns the score of the actor
      void resetCards()
      Resets Cards and the score of the cards
      void setScore()
      setScore is a method that defines the actors point score based on the cards they have - Defines array of possible cards and points - Trims myCards - Splits the myCard String into an array of each card - Searchs through the index cards and find the corresponding points for the cards - Adds up the total amount of points and sets it to the actors score
      void showCards()
      Prints to the console the myCards String showing the actos cards
      void showFirstCard()
      Prints to the console the first card in your hand, and a * for the second card To be used by the dealer class

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Actor

        public Actor()
        Constructor -myCards -myScore -numberOfCards

    • Method Detail

      • addCard

        public void addCard​(java.lang.String card)
        Adds a Card to the actors "hand"
        Parameters:
        card - String of the Card to be added ie ("10","K",etc)

      • showCards

        public void showCards()
        Prints to the console the myCards String showing the actos cards

      • showFirstCard

        public void showFirstCard()
        Prints to the console the first card in your hand, and a * for the second card To be used by the dealer class

      • resetCards

        public void resetCards()
        Resets Cards and the score of the cards

      • getScore

        public int getScore()
        Returns the score of the actor
        Returns:
        myScore: the current score of the actor

      • catch21

        public boolean catch21()
        checks if the actor has 21
        Returns:
        a boolean value if the actor has a score of 21

      • catchBust

        public boolean catchBust()
        checks if the actor has busted
        Returns:
        a boolean value if the actor has busted

      • catch17

        public boolean catch17()
        checks if the actor has more than 17
        Returns:
        a boolean value if the actor hhas above 17 (will be used mostly for the dealer)

      • setScore

        public void setScore()
        setScore is a method that defines the actors point score based on the cards they have - Defines array of possible cards and points - Trims myCards - Splits the myCard String into an array of each card - Searchs through the index cards and find the corresponding points for the cards - Adds up the total amount of points and sets it to the actors score
